Verses: 1 manupuththirane, Nee Isravel Malaigalai Nokkith Theerkkadharisanam Uraiththu, Sollavendiyadhu Ennavendraal: Isravel Malaigale, Karththarudaiya Vaarththaiyaik Kelungal.
2 karththaraagiya Aandavar Uraikkiraar; Pagaignan Ungalaikkuriththu Aa, Aa, Niththiya Medugal Engal Vasamaayitru Endru Sollugirapadiyinaal,

3 nee Theerkkadharisanam Uraiththuchchollavendiyadhu Ennavendraal: Karththaraagiya Aandavar Uraikkiraar, Neengal Purajaadhigalil Meedhiyaanavargalukku Sudhandharamaayirukkumpadi Avargal Ungalaip Paazhaakki, Ungalai Sutrilumirundhu Vizhunginapadiyinaalum, Neengal Vaayaadigalukkuppechchum Janangalukku Avadhoorumaanavargalaanapadiyinaalum,

4 isravel Malaigale Neengal Karththaraagiya Aandavarudaiya Vaarththaiyaik Kelungal; Malaigalukkum Medugalukkum, Aarugalukkum, Pallaththaakkugalukkum, Paazhaakkappatta Avaandhara Idangalukkum, Verumaiyaai Vidappatta Pattanangalukkum Karththaraagiya Aandavar Sollugiraar: Ungalai Sutrilum Meedhiyaana Purajaadhigalukku Neengal Kollaiyum Pariyaasamumaaip Ponapadiyinaal,

5 karththaraagiya Aandavar Sollugiraar: En Dhesaththaik Kollaiyidappatta Veliyaakkumpadikku Adhai Muzhu Irudhayaththin Sandhoshaththodum Garvamaana Manadhodum Thangalukku Sudhandharamaaga Niyamiththukkonda Purajaadhigalil Meedhiyaanavargalukku Virodhamaagavum Edhom Anaiththukkum Virodhamaagavum, En Akkiniyaana Erichchalinaal Pesinen Endru Nichchayamaai Sollugiren.

6 aagaiyaal, Nee Isravel Dhesaththaikkuriththuth Theerkkadharisanam Uraiththu, Malaigalukkum, Medugalukkum, Aarugalukkum, Pallaththaakkugalukkum Sollavendiyadhu Ennavendraal: Karththaraagiya Aandavar Uraikkiraar, Idho, Neengal Purajaadhigal Seyyum Avamaanaththai Sumandhapadiyinaal Naan En Erichchalinaalum En Ukkiraththinaalum Pesinen;
7 aadhalaal, Karththaraagiya Aandavaraayirukkira Naan En Karaththai Uyarththuven, Ungalai Sutrilumirukkira Purajaadhigal Thangaludaiya Avamaanaththai Nichchayamaai Sumappaargal Endru Sollugiren.
8 isravel Malaigale, Neengal Ungal Koppugalai Vittu, En Janamaagiya Isravelukku Ungal Kanigalaik Koduppeergal; Avargal Sameebamaai Vandhuvittaargal.
9 idho Naan Ungal Patchaththilirundhu, Ungalaik Kannokkuven; Neengal Panpaduththappattu Vidhaikkappaduveergal.
10 naan Ungalmel Isravel Vamsamaagiya Manushar Yaavaraiyum Varththikkappannuven; Pattanangal Kudiyetrappadum, Avaandharamaana Sthalangal Kattappadum.

11 ungalmel Manusharaiyum Mirugajeevangalaiyum Perugip Palugumpadi Varththikkappannuven; Poorvanaatkalil Neengal Irundha Nilaimaiyil Naan Ungalai Sthaabiththu, Ungal Mundhina Seeraippaarkkilum Ungalukku Narcheer Undaagachcheyven; Adhinaal Naan Karththar Endru Arindhukolveergal.
12 naan Ungalmel En Janamaagiya Isravelin Manusharai Nadamaadappannuven, Avargal Unnaik Kaiyaaluvaargal; Avargalukku Sudhandharamaayiruppaai; Nee Inimel Avargalai Saagakkoduppadhillai.
13 karththaraagiya Aandavar Sollugiradhu Ennavendraal Janangal Unnaippaarththu: Nee Manusharaip Patchikkira Dhesamendrum, Nee Un Janangalai Saagakkodukkira Dhesamendrum Sollugirapadiyinaal,
14 nee Inimel Manusharaip Patchippadhumillai, Inimel Un Janangalai Saagakkoduppadhumillai Endru Karththaraagiya Aandavar Sollugiraar.

15 naan Inimel Purajaadhigal Seyyum Avamaanaththai Unnidaththile Ketkappannuvadhumillai. Nee Janangalin Nindhaiyai Inimel Sumappadhumillai; Nee Inimel Un Jaadhigalai Saagakkoduppadhumillaiyendru Karththaraagiya Aandavar Uraikkiraar Endru Sol Endraar
16 pinnum Karththarudaiya Vaarththai Enakku Undaagi, Avar:

17 manupuththirane, Isravel Vamsaththaar Thangal Suyadhesaththile Kudiyirukkaiyil Adhaith Thangal Nadakkaiyinaalum Thangal Kiriyaigalinaalum Theettuppaduththinaargal; Avargaludaiya Nadakkai En Mugaththukku Munbaaga Dhoorasthreeyin Theettaippol Irundhadhu.
18 aagaiyinaal Dhesaththile Avargal Sindhina Raththaththinimiththamum, Adhai Avargal Thangal Naragalaana Vikkiragangalaal Theettuppaduththinadhinimiththamum Naan En Ukkiraththai Avargalmel Ootri,
19 avargalaip Purajaadhigalukkulle Sidharadiththen; Dhesangalil Thootrippodappattaargal; Avargaludaiya Nadakkaiyinpadiyeyum Avargaludaiya Kiriyaigalinpadiyeyum Avargalai Nyaayantheerththen.

20 avargal Purajaadhigalidaththil Ponapodhu Andha Janangal Ivargalaikkuriththu: Ivargal Karththarudaiya Janangal, Avarudaiya Dhesaththilirundhu Vandhaargal Endru Sonnadhinaal, Ivargal En Parisuththa Naamaththaip Parisuththakkulaichchalaakkinaargal.
21 aanaalum Isravel Vamsaththaar Thaangal Vandhuserndha Purajaadhigalidaththile Parisuththakkulaichchalaakkina En Parisuththa Naamaththinimiththamaagave Irangugiren.

22 aadhalaal, Nee Isravel Vamsaththaarai Nokki: Karththaraagiya Aandavar Uraikkiradhu Ennavendraal, Isravel Vamsaththaare, Ungalnimiththamalla Neengal Vandhu Serndha Purajaadhigalidaththil Parisuththakkulaichchalaakkina En Parisuththa Naamaththinimiththame Naan Ippadi Seygiren.

23 purajaadhigalin Naduve Neengal Parisuththakkulaichchalaakkinadhum Avargalukkul Ungalaal Parisuththakkulaichchalaakkappattadhumaana En Magaththaana Naamaththai Naan Parisuththampannuven; Appozhudhu Purajaadhigal Thangal Kangalukku Munbaaga Naan Ungalukkul Parisuththampannappadugaiyil, Naan Karththar Enbadhai Arindhukolvaargal Endru Karththaraagiya Aandavar Sollugiraar.
24 naan Ungalaip Purajaadhigalidaththilirundhu Azhaiththu Ungalai Sagala Dhesangalilumirundhu Serththu, Ungal Suyadhesaththirku Ungalaik Konduvaruven.

25 appozhudhu Naan Ungalmel Suththamaana Jalam Thelippen; Naan Ungaludaiya Ellaa Asuththangalaiyum Ungaludaiya Ellaa Naragalaana Vikkiragangalaiyum Neekki Ungalai Suththamaakkuven, Neengal Suththamaaveergal.

26 ungalukku Navamaana Irudhayaththaik Koduththu, Ungal Ullaththile Pudhidhaana Aaviyaik Kattalaiyittu, Kallaana Irudhayaththai Ungal Maamsaththilirundhu Eduththuppottu Sadhaiyaana Irudhayaththai Ungalukkuk Koduppen.
27 ungal Ullaththile En Aaviyai Vaiththu, Ungalai En Kattalaigalil Nadakkavum En Nyaayangalaik Kaikkollavum Avaigalinpadi Seyyavumpannuven.
28 ungal Pidhaakkalukku Naan Koduththa Dhesaththile Neengal Kudiyiruppeergal; Neengal En Janamaayiruppeergal, Naan Ungal Dhevanaayirundhu,
29 ungal Asuththangalaiyellaam Neekki, Ungalai Ratchiththu Ungalmel Panjaththaik Kattalaiyidaamal, Kodhumaiyai Varavazhaiththu, Adhaipperugappanni,
30 neengal Inimel Jaadhigalukkulle Panjaththinaalundaagum Nindhaiyai Adaiyaadhapadikku, Virutchaththin Kanigalaiyum Vayalin Palangalaiyum Perugappannuven.
31 appozhudhu Neengal Ungal Pollaadha Maarkkangalaiyum Ungal Thagaadha Kiriyaigalaiyum Ninaiththu, Ungal Akkiramangalinimiththamum Ungal Aruvaruppugalinimiththamum Ungalaiye Arosippeergal.

32 naan Ippadi Seyvadhu Ungal Nimiththamaaga Allavendru Karththaraagiya Aandavar Sollugiraar, Idhu Ungalukku Ariyappattirukkakkadavadhu; Isravel Vamsaththaare Ungal Vazhigalinimiththam Vetki Naanungal.

33 karththaraagiya Aandavar Sollugiradhu Ennavendraal: Naan Ungal Akkiramangalaiyellaam Neekki, Ungalai Suththamaakkum Kaalaththile Pattanangalil Kudiyetruvippen; Avaandharamaana Sthalangalum Kattappadum.
34 paazhaakkappatta Dhesam Kadandhupogira Yaavarudaiya Paarvaikkum Paazhaaikkidandhadharkup Padhilaaga Payiridappadum.

35 paazhaaikkidandha Iththesam, Edhen Thottaththaippolaayitrendrum, Avaandharamum Paazhum Nirmoolamumaayirundha Pattanangal Aranippaanavaigalum Kudiyetrappattavaigalumaayirukkiradhu Endrum Solluvaargal.

36 karththaraagiya Naan Nirmoolamaanavaigalaik Kattugiren Endrum, Paazhaanadhaip Payirnilamaakkugiren Endrum, Appozhudhu Ungalai Sutrilumulla Meedhiyaana Jaadhigal Arindhukolvaargal; Karththaraagiya Naan Idhai Sonnen, Idhai Seyven.

37 karththaraagiya Aandavar Sollugiradhu Ennavendraal: Isravel Vamsaththaarukkaaga Naan Idhai Anukkiragancheyyumpadi Avargal Ennidaththil Vinnappam Pannavendum; Mandhai Perugugiradhupol Avargalil Manidharaip Perugappannuven.

38 pandigai Kaalangalil Erusalemile Parisuththampannappattu Varugira Mandhaigal Eppadith Thiralaayirukkiradho, Appadiye Avaandharamaayirundha Pattanangal Manusharin Mandhaiyaal Nirambiyirukkum; Adhinaal Naan Karththar Enbadhai Arindhukolvaargal Endru Sol Endraar.
